name: Forgotten Citadel
description: A massive fortress that once served as the ultimate defensive position now lies abandoned and overgrown. The architectural marvels and potential hidden chambers attract explorers and scholars, while the strategic importance and defensive features can still provide advantages for those who claim it.
atmosphere: Footsteps echo through chambers that once housed ultimate defensive position. Air carries architectural marvels, strategic importance, and forgotten power dust scent. Massive fortress rises overgrown and abandoned like sleeping giant. Skin tingles with sense of hidden chambers and defensive features. Taste of architectural marvels and strategic importance fills mouth. Weight of forgotten power and strategic advantages presses down on you.
